bestPracticeRules.title: Use Meaningful Variable Names
bestPracticeRules.intent: best-practices rule: Use descriptive names for variables, functions, and components. Avoid single letters (except i, j in loops).
bestPracticeRules.recommendation: Use descriptive names for variables, functions, and components. Avoid single letters (except i, j in loops).

codeExample.bad: const x = getData(); const a = x.filter(u => u.age > 18);
codeExample.good: const users = getData(); const adults = users.filter(user => user.age > 18);

bestPracticeRules.detectionExplanation: Detects use meaningful variable names patterns in code to ensure compliance.
bestPracticeRules.remediationExplanation: Fix this by: Use descriptive names for variables, functions, and components. Avoid single letters (except i, j in loops).
bestPracticeRules.detectionLimitations: May not catch all instances in complex or obfuscated code.
